creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: cuff style bracelet made from several bands of silver on which cones with spheres have been attached in three rows; the ends of the bracelet are solid pieces of silver gradually declining in size; silver wire twisted into rope has been wrapped around the solid ends and soldered to the solid silver piece; one cone adorns each solid silver end
title: Bracelet, one of a pair
